title: Consolidate belief tracking and validation documentation
description:
Merge overlapping documentation for confidence/assumptions and validation gates:

**Belief Tracking Consolidation:**

Current (796+ lines across 4 files):
- confidence-scoring.md (376 lines)
- assumption-management.md (420 lines)
- task-schema-consolidated.md - belief tracking section
- error-recovery.md - confidence thresholds

Target (~500 lines in 1-2 files):
- belief-tracking.md - consolidated framework
- Remove duplicated content from other files

**Validation Gates Consolidation:**

Current (950+ lines across 2 files):
- validation-gates-reference.md (425 lines)
- validation-gates-integration.md (525 lines)

Target (~550 lines in 1 file):
- validation-gates.md - single comprehensive reference

**Files to modify:**
- Merge: confidence-scoring.md + assumption-management.md
- Merge: validation-gates-reference.md + validation-gates-integration.md
- Update: cross-references in other files

**Acceptance criteria:**
- All information preserved
- ~550 tokens saved
- Easier to find authoritative guidance
notes: Completed 2026-01-22. Created belief-tracking.md (~200 lines) consolidating confidence scoring and assumption management. Created validation-gates.md (~250 lines) consolidating both validation gate files. Original files archived to .archive/consolidated-2026-01-22/. Achieved ~75% reduction.
decision_rationale: Combined related concepts (confidence + assumptions) into single belief-tracking.md. Combined validation gate reference and integration into single authoritative file.
